website_summaries.verdict: A classic Galileo thermometer that stands 14 inches tall.
pros: Standard Galileo thermometer that is easy to read and has five spheres with great colors
Customers love that it makes for a good decoration as well as a good thermometer
cons: A few customers reported that the spheres remained at the bottom of the glass no matter the temperature

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I'd always admired these thermometers and was happy to open the box when it arrived. No breakage, perfectly packed. I placed it on a shelf and it worked exactly as it was supposed to. Then my cat knocked it over. I don't know what the liquid inside is, but it splashed onto the cabinet, wall and floor. It had a noxious odor which I am having trouble eliminating. I tried washing the wall and floor, but the odor still remains, albeit reduced. I am going to wait it out to see if exposure to air takes care of it. Damned cat! The product itself is beautiful - the cat is on my you-know-what list.
customer_reviews.author: MJF

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of conversation
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just as described. The thermometer is 14" tall and is made of glass. It's pretty big, about two inches in diameter. The base is larger but it's obviously still unstable if you knock it over. Product package is great too, it was SUPER well wrapped. Here's how to read the temperature on the thermometer: To read a Galileo thermometer, look at the lowest hanging bubble in the middle of the tube—the one that is not entirely sunk, nor entirely floating at the top. This bubble is in equilibrium with the surrounding liquid, and its tag will tell the current temperature.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaKarenina

customer_reviews.title: Great conversation piece
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a hostess gift and I absolutely loved it! I purchased 3 more to give to others as hostess gifts and one for my father in law, as it is really difficult to buy gifts for 85 year olds that have everything, I bet they don't have a Galileo thermometer! and now something interesting to show to others. Great gift for the money
customer_reviews.author: Kaydale

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL ADDITION TO OUR HOME
customer_reviews.text: This exceeded our expectations it's functional and beautiful at the same time! We just don't know why we had not gotten one before!
customer_reviews.author: FRANKESMOM

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: I like this as a decoration, but can't seem to keep one. I have broken 3 (and one from a different vendor, I think was poorly packed and arrived shattered). And, when it breaks the liquid really stinks; hard to get rid of.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J Cook

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 14" Glass Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: My sister-in-law sent us one of these several years ago for a Christmas gift. It was knocked off the stand it was sitting on and of course broke into many pieces. Searched several sites and found this one. Actually bought several for gifts. All the folks (family and friends) including us treasure this beautiful Glass Thermometer. It's fun to watch and truly works too! Buy it, you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, perfect. I have a small window up high in the living room, my Galileo thermometer was too tall, so I got this one. (after measuring first!) Fits perfect, looks great with the sun providing the backlight, always reads pretty darn hot in the day due to the sun heating the window and pretty darn cold at night due to the window heat loss. I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Harry Moto

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift!
customer_reviews.text: It's always hard to shop for my dad. He's a really laid back guy who has gotten way too many ties and slippers over the years. He has all of the fishing and gardening stuff he needs, and I ran out of book ideas this time. Then I found this. Perfect! The price was well within our budget, and I knew he didn't have one already. It came well packaged, and survived both UPS shipping and the trip to my parents house. My dad has it sitting right next to his armchair. He said it's great because now he doesn't have to get out of his chair to check the thermostat ;)
customer_reviews.author: embe_3

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: I like this thermometer so much I have given it many times as a gift. It is a great decorative piece too, and I have received many compliments on its uniqueness.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complements my desk well
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Glass is pretty thick but still looks fragile. The color (red blue orange green purple) of the liquids are very bright and float accurately. Product is as described and I have gotten many comments on it at the office. It came packaged in Styrofoam and very secure. I bought this for $15 and wouldn't hesitate paying double that if I had to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Decorative and somewhat functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 16 year old son, who loves Science. It was very well packed, and, although I could hear the number tags clinking against the glass cylinder, it arrived undamaged. The spheres within the cylinder are brightly colored, and it looks nice on the shelf. It also is pretty accurate, although obviously it's not as accurate as modern thermometers. Still, there's a lot to be said for nice looking things.
customer_reviews.author: Marjie, Mother of 9Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: I've brought this to a couple of holiday swap parties and it's always a hit!! Well made, just the right size for an office
customer_reviews.author: misto1211

customer_reviews.title: Nice conversation piece
customer_reviews.text: Like all density thermometers, the accuracy is iffy, but I didn't buy it for that. I purchased it to show students an example of how different density materials respond to change in temp. For that, it is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Quinlan II

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice but none of the balls float to the top ...
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line: doesn't work at all. I bought this as a replacement for one I accidentally broke. It looks nice but none of the balls float to the top -- all of them stay at the bottom. The room it is in is ~72 degrees F and I am ~100 feet above sea level. I have had working Galileo Thermometers in the same location in the past, this is just poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Scientific eye candy.
customer_reviews.text: Mom loved it. Perfect conversation piece at her bridge gatherings, and fits in well with her Fla decor.
customer_reviews.author: TX_Iron

customer_reviews.title: Accidental breakage
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I broke my sisters. She loved it and better than the one she had.
customer_reviews.author: Fannie

customer_reviews.title: Made mom happy
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift to my mom. She really liked it and that is great because she is hard to please.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Not working properly
customer_reviews.text: The item does not work, I’m upset as it was a gift, and the recipient of my gift states it does not work. It doesn’t change temp, stuck on 80 degrees at all times
customer_reviews.author: Peggy G

customer_reviews.title: Love these gifts
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my son who is a meteorologist in the Air Force. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie K

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I have seen these before and they are as nice looking as they are fascinating. I bought this to give to a techy friend for a birthday gift and he absolutely loves it. This is not your normal thermometer. It is attractive, decorative, and fun to watch.
customer_reviews.author: mchr

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful, whimsical thermometer that gives you a fairly accurate ...
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful, whimsical thermometer that gives you a fairly accurate "ball park" reading. I gave it to my husband as a gift and he liked it. At a glance you can see if you need to wear a swimsuit or jacket.....
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rossi

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for office desk
customer_reviews.text: Good size, wasn't sure if it would arrive intact and what the size would be like, using for my desk office, base is stable enough to be sturdy, keeping it away from nosy cats and kids, as I hear if it breaks the odor is bad.
customer_reviews.author: youtuber

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a coworker and she loves it! Great value. Packaging was perfect and protected the product well. Exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: I was so glad it got here in one piece
customer_reviews.text: came packaged safely in Styrofoam. I was so glad it got here in one piece! its really pretty. I wonder how accurate it is for measuring temperature but its a nice conversation piece. it does look fragile, to knock it over or drop it will certainly break it.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: accuracy
customer_reviews.text: This one is a gift for Xmas. It's very much the same as the one I have. Mine I find to be quite accurate in readings. The new gift hasn't ben around long enough to make a judgment. Not sure that they are manufactured by the same company. So, little early to give a rating.
customer_reviews.author: SW Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Love my Galileo Thermometer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Galileo thermometer. I had 1 for years & it got broken so this replacement met all expectations. It’s exactly as described, and it comes with complete directions on how to read it. A totally beautiful conversation piece, for a great price!

customer_reviews.title: That they are fragile and very hard to clean up.

It was shipped quickly and intact, which I was worried about because it's so fragile. It was definitely a hit. Now, I want to get one for myself!

But I'm afraid the dog when he plays rough with his stuffed animals will knock them over. I have to do a little research, see what would happen if one was to brake. Kind of wish there was a light in them, can't see them at all, at night.

customer_reviews.title: An Interesting Thing To Have Around The House

customer_reviews.title: Galileo 14 inch Glass Thermometer with 5 Multi Colored Spheres
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered on time. However I did not like the packaging it came in. It came in a large rectangular box that stated that it was fragile. My problem is the stuffing inside. It only came with a plastic ballooned cushion. With a product this fragile I would think they would use something more substantial to cushion the product and prevent it from movement. I purchased this as a gift and haven't heard any complaints as to how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha
